text.p: Suppose that the variable myString is assigned a string value. Write a piece of Python code that prints out a new string, containing the odd elements of myString. For example, if myString had the value abcdefg, then the result would be the string aceg.
For problems such as these, do not include input statements or define variables we said you are given. Our graders will provide values for you, so write your code assuming they are already defined.

codeparam.answer_display: s = "" for i in range(0,len(myString),2): s += myString[i] print s
